name: rgen3
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0
body: |- wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wral(s2, c2, w0)))
-| wi(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c2)), w0)

stmt.origin: rgen2(s0, s1, c0, c1, wral(s2, c2, w0))

body.origin:
|- wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wral(s2, c2, w0)))
-| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wral(s2, c2, w0))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wral(s2, c2, w0)))

-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)

stmt.pretty: ralrimiva(s2, c2, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1), w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wral(s2, c2, w0))

-| diffsw(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)))

comment: Generalization rule for restricted quantification, with three quantifiers. (Contributed by NM, 12-Jan-2008.)
